channel.title: Suggestion to John Oliver, check the singularity
channel.description:
# This is much, much bigger than Snowden's!
In short, the singularity **is** near, Kurzweil is probably a bit crazy, but still I bet he's off on his prediction. It should happen before 2040, **maybe even before 2029**. And it could be a tremendous **existential risk to humanity**, the uprise of our next stage or, very unlikely but still possible: neither.
Let me know if you'd like to [know more](http://basiux.org).
Cheers! ;)
